task.title: Check Network
task.shortdesc: Check how long it takes for users' packets to reach SBC server. If the one-way delay from users to the SBC should be lower than 100ms, or the call quality would be bad.

step.cmd: Find a website that supports checking one-way delay from different locations to the SBC server.

info.xref: Here is a ping test tool on website for reference.

step.cmd: Enter the public IP address or domain name of the SBC server.

step.info: The one-way delay from your target users' locations to the SBC should be lower than 100ms.
